formatDescription: Xspf is a format for sharing playlists, supported by many applications. It uses xml, so is easily edited with a text editor. The official website gives useful information as to the structure of xspf files: https://www.xspf.org/quickstart
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of Australia / National Library of Australia

internalSignatures.name: XML Shareable Playlist Format
internalSignatures.note:
BOF, absolute zero: <?xml version={25-26}<playlist{1-14} xmlns="http://xspf.org/ns/0/
EOF, offset 0-1: </playlist>
